oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Omnipresent Ethernet : a novel metro communication system using binary plus source routing and carrier Ethernet
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MEHTA, S
VAISHAMPAYAN, R
GUMASTE, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present Omnipresent Ethernet - by using binary and source routing embedded in Carrier Ethernet advances as a method for providing end-to-end communication in metro networks. A test-bed is built to showcase triple play applications. (C) OSA Optical Society of America.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: OFC: 2009 CONFERENCE ON OPTICAL FIBER COMMUNICATION, VOLS 1-5,3132-3134
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Conference on Optical Fiber Communication (OFC 2009),San Diego, CA,MAR 22-26, 2009
